ygData.subject: newbie smithy
ygData.msgSnippet: I have 80 plat in the bank and I have around 60 points saved up at the guild master. he offer me smithing so i will take full advantage of it.  But i was
ygData.messageBody:
I have 80 plat in the bank and I have around 60 points saved up at the guild
master. he offer me smithing so i will take full advantage of it. But i was
wondering if i can buy metal or ore or whatever at merchants instead of trying
to kill rock dervishes for them ?? Can i buy rusty daggers at merchants ?

btw, i am lvl 18 and wouldn't mind camping out newbie zones to get these ores.

Erudite, Wizard.

Richard Yu - IBM
